backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister’s data models and mutable state for users, subscriptions, payments, posts, marketplace listings, storage, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, affected files, components, and test IDs for authentication‑first flow and post‑login behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of multiple frontend files and sections.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Configures asset caching and security headers for all frontend build outputs.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with global background/foreground tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML bootstrap file loading the root app and Google Analytics.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app integrating sections, authentication flow, global state, scrolling behavior, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthEntryDi: Authentication dialog with sign‑in/sign‑up tabs, Google login, error handling, and auto‑close on success.
frontend/src/components/auth/ContinueWit: Google‑styled button that triggers Internet Identity login and displays loading states.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Renders sign‑in/out UI using Internet Identity with Google‑styled button and error handling.
frontend/src/components/decor/SparkleOve: Decorative animated sparkle texture overlay that respects reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Shows a development‑only alert when canister config or actor initialization issues are detected.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Float: Floating button that appears after scrolling and smoothly scrolls the page back to the top.
Floating action button that scrolls the user to the Create Wish section.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Top‑of‑page progress bar showing scroll progress with a gradient fill.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Stick: Sticky navigation bar with active‑section highlighting, desktop links, and a mobile slide‑out menu.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Renders a badge indicating whether the user is on the free, pro, or creator plan.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Animates children into view when scrolled into the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: Provides React Query hooks to fetch download history, saved templates, and creator earnings for authenticated users.
frontend/src/features/admin/AccessDenied: Card component informing users they lack admin privileges to access certain panels.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPayment: Admin UI to view, filter, and update manual UPI payment requests with approval and rejection actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAll: Fetches all payment requests from the backend using React Query and the actor API.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useIsA: Checks whether the authenticated user is an admin via actor.isAdmin using React Query.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useUpd: Provides a mutation to approve or reject payment requests and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/features/auth/useUserAuthUp: Mutation hook that creates or updates a user auth record after login via the actor API.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Utility functions for drawing vignette, glow text, shadows, sparkles, confetti, and corner decorations on canvas.
Generates a themed, decorated card image on canvas with text fitting, background loading, and visual effects.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardTex: Sanitizes card text and formats title, message, and footer while removing placeholders and instructions.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardThe: Defines premium card themes with fonts, colors, decorations, and provides theme lookup helpers.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/compone: Interactive image carousel supporting arrow keys, swipe gestures, and reduced-motion handling for selecting card variation images.
Canvas-based confetti animation triggered on demand, with reduced-motion support and callback execution on completion.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/enhance: Applies subtle post-processing to a canvas, adding contrast, vignette, and slight sharpening without altering text.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/fitText: Utilities for fitting text into a canvas region by adjusting font size and line height, plus safe text region calculation.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/generat: Returns predefined parameter sets for generating 2–3 visual card design variations without changing text.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image as an HTMLImageElement with cross‑origin support and error handling.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Generates a simple printable PDF-like view in a new window using HTML/CSS, embedding birthday content and optional watermark.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/shortWi: Converts any wish text into a 15–20 word card‑safe message with cleanup, shortening/expansion, and validation utilities.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Provides text-wrapping functions for canvases, including emoji-aware wrapping with optional max-line limits.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Displays a community post card with metadata, creator info, and follow/view actions.
Shows a dialog with full post details, creator info, and follow actions.
Provides a dialog for authenticated users to create a new community post with title, type, and description.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: React Query hooks for fetching all posts or a single post from the backend actor.
Mutation hook to create a new post and update cached post data with success/error toasts.
Manages following creators via backend subscription and local storage, with hooks to follow and check follow state.
frontend/src/features/examples/component: Renders an animated example wish card with themes, emojis, and variation controls.
frontend/src/features/examples/exampleWi: Provides emoji selection and enhancement utilities for example wish titles, bodies, and decorations.
Formats a SampleWish into a short title and 1–2 sentence body with length limits and greeting cleanup.
Maps wishes to visual style tags using explicit styleTag or tone-based fallback.
Provides seeded-random typography and background theme selection and combines them into a card theme.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines SampleWish and a list of preset example birthday wishes with metadata.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Supplies allowed relationship, tone, language, and personality options for the generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack into a structured, emoji-rich text block.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Assembles a BirthdayPack by generating wish variants using language phrases, tone rules, and optional memory.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides English, Hinglish, and Hindi phrase sets and selects the set based on language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Randomizes form fields for a GeneratorFormData instance using predefined option lists.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines types for generator inputs, outputs, and option enums such as Relationship and Tone.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: Implements a dialog for creating marketplace listings with validation, entitlements checks, and submission handling.
Displays a marketplace listing card with title, description, price, creator, and actions, including locked and upgrade states.
Modal dialog allowing buyers to message sellers, copy or send the message, and record interest via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: React Query mutation for creating marketplace listings and invalidating the listings cache on success.
Mutation that records buyer interest in a listing and invalidates listing data after success.
Query hook fetching interaction counts for a listing when an authenticated user is available.
Hooks to fetch all marketplace listings or a specific listing using the actor API.
frontend/src/features/payments/hooks/use: Mutation for submitting manual UPI payment requests and refreshing relevant user payment queries.
Fetches authenticated users’ submitted payment requests via the actor API.
frontend/src/features/payments/manualUpi: Defines static constants for UPI payments such as UPI ID, payee name, and QR code path.
UI step showing QR code, UPI instructions, and actions for copying or launching UPI payment links.
Utility for storing and retrieving the user’s payment email in localStorage.
Form for submitting UPI payment details including email, UTR, and optional screenshot upload.
Generates a UPI payment deep link based on plan type and amount.
Disables Razorpay SDK and returns a stub upgrade handler for a manual UPI payment flow.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays a grid of placeholder cards showing upcoming premium card designer features.
Provides UI controls to adjust background, typography, alignment, colors, borders, animations, and photo uploads for the premium card designer.
Offers download, share, and copy-text actions for exporting premium cards in square or story formats.
Manages theme selection and design workflow, rendering preview, customization tools, and export actions.
Renders the live card preview with theme styling, animations, text formatting, emojis, and optional photo.
Defines available premium themes with gradients, colors, fonts, emojis, and lookup utilities.
Declares TypeScript types for themes, styling options, and the premium designer state.
React hook managing premium card designer state with setters for theme, styles, photo, and other design options.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/compo: UI component showing buttons for upcoming premium video and voice features with toast notifications.
Displays detected prompt analysis fields such as event type, tone, theme, and layout using badges.
Editor panel for modifying card text fields, tone selection, and triggering text or design regeneration.
Input component for prompt-based card generation with example prompts and generate button.
Carousel UI for navigating between multiple generated card variations.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/event: Maps event types to recommended card themes and exports a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/gener: Simulates AI-generated card variations by parsing prompt keywords and returning three structured card designs.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/promp: Rule-based prompt analyzer detecting event type, tone, visual theme, layout style, and keywords from text.
Provides rule-based generation of card titles, messages, and footers using event and tone templates.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/types: Defines event, tone, theme, layout types and interfaces for prompt analysis, card content, and studio state.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Manages daily quota tracking in localStorage with functions to get, increment, and compute remaining quota.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: React hook that calculates remaining message quota, syncing with backend for authenticated users and local storage for guests.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata, pricing, features, and entitlements for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: UI overlay component that blocks premium features and opens the pricing modal when clicked.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Implements the multi-step pricing and payment modal including plan selection and UPI payment flow.
Renders a feature comparison table for Free, Pro, and Creator plans.
frontend/src/features/subscription/UPGRA: Checklist detailing tests for upgrade buttons, pricing modal behavior, and payment flows.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: Computes the user's effective subscription plan by checking authentication, subscription status, and expiry, then returns matching entitlements.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: Fetches and exposes the caller's subscription status with a refresh method using react-query.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: UI component that loads a surprise payload, plays animations and optional music, and displays name and message with confetti effects.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: Provides hooks to create surprise links and fetch surprise payloads via actor calls, with toast notifications and query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Maps a template ID to combined base and template-specific CSS class strings.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Exports a registry of background image paths for templates and a helper to resolve image keys.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines all card templates with metadata including icons, gradients, and background asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks the currently visible page section using IntersectionObserver for scroll‑spy behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via an AuthClient-based context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Observes an element with IntersectionObserver and returns whether it is in view, with optional one-time triggering.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Stores and retrieves a user's selected plan in localStorage scoped by principal, clearing when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion by observing a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user-related data such as downloads, saved templates, and creator earnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Computes document scroll progress using requestAnimationFrame and updates a 0–1 progress value.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend to verify the authenticated user's principal, returning null when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global dark theme styling, utility classes, and layout helpers using Tailwind CSS.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements a clipboard copy helper with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Provides utilities to format timestamps into relative time or readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens a principal string by keeping prefix and suffix characters with an ellipsis.
frontend/src/lib/scroll.ts: Offers smooth scrolling to anchors with sticky header offset and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share link with URL-encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Renders the community posts section with tabs, post listing, and dialogs for viewing and creating posts.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Displays user dashboard stats, authentication prompt, and admin panel access based on identity.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Displays filterable example wishes and allows users to prefill the generator form from selected samples.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Renders an FAQ list using accordions inside a styled card layout.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Shows the site footer with branding, quick links, legal links, and attribution.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the main wish generator form with quick mode and prompt-based AI generation workflows.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Provides the landing hero with branding, calls to action, social proof, and authentication prompts.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Displays the Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy in styled card sections.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Implements the marketplace UI with search, filtering, listing display, and gated creation/purchase actions based on subscription entitlements.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Handles generation output display, theme selection, card previews, sharing/export actions, and prompt‑studio regeneration logic.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Renders the pricing plans with features and upgrade buttons, using a static plan list and shared UI components.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Displays template options and allows users to select a template for card generation.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for Razorpay checkout options, responses, and global window integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, brand colors, shadows, fonts, and scanning paths.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Configures Vite for a React app with environment variable prefixes, path aliasing, a dev server proxy, and optimized build settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to making authentication the initial screen for unauthenticated users.
